instruction: Generate a funny essay to this statement.
input: Statement: Cats make the best pets.
output: Cats make the best pets because they are funny, intelligent, and low maintenance. They can provide hours of entertainment just by watching them, as they can be surprisingly agile and consistently come up with creative ways of getting around the house. They are also incredibly intelligent and can learn tricks easily. Plus, cats are very self-sufficient animals that require minimal care from their owners, making them the perfect pet for the busy person. So, if you're looking for a pet that is guaranteed to bring joy to your life and make you smile - cats are the pets for you!
